Bash("C:\\Users\\szk\\Work\\MarkItDown.GUI\\MarkItDown.GUI\\bin\\Debug\\net10.0-windows8.0\\win-x64\\lib\\python\\python-embed\\python.exe" -c "
from openai import OpenAI
import base64, time
client = OpenAI\(base_url=''http://localhost:11434/v1'', api_key=''ollama'', timeout=120.0\)
# 小さいテスト画像を作成
import struct, zlib
def create_tiny_png\(\):
    raw = b''\\x00'' + b''\\xff\\x00\\x00'' * 2
    raw += b''\\x00'' + b''\\x00\\xff\\x00'' * 2
    def chunk\(ctype, data\):
        c = ctype + data
        return struct.pack\(''>I'', len\(data\)\) + c + struct.pack\(''>I'', zlib.crc32\(c\) & 0xffffffff\)
    return b''\\x89PNG\\r\\n\\x1a\\n'' + chunk\(b''IHDR'', struct.pack\(''>IIBBBBB'', 2, 2, 8, 2, 0, 0, 0\)\) + chunk\(b''IDAT'', zlib.compress\(raw\)\) + chunk\(b''IEND'', b''''\)
img = base64.b64encode\(create_tiny_png\(\)\).decode\(\)
print\(''Sending request to llava...'', flush=True\)
start = time.time\(\)
resp = client.chat.completions.create\(
    model=''llava'',
    messages=[{''role'':''user'',''content'':[{''type'':''text'',''text'':''What is this?''},{''type'':''image_url'',''image_url'':{''url'':f''data:image/png;base64,{img}''}}]}]
\)
elapsed = time.time\(\) - start
print\(f''Response in {elapsed:.1f}s: {resp.choices[0].message.content[:200]}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\szk\\Work\\MarkItDown.GUI\\MarkItDown.GUI\\bin\\Debug\\net10.0-windows8.0\\win-x64\\lib\\python\\python-embed\\python.exe" -c "
from openai import OpenAI
import base64, time
client = OpenAI\(base_url=''http://localhost:11434/v1'', api_key=''ollama'', timeout=120.0\)
# 小さいテスト画像を作成
import struct, zlib
def create_tiny_png\(\):
    raw = b''\\x00'' + b''\\xff\\x00\\x00'' * 2
    raw += b''\\x00'' + b''\\x00\\xff\\x00'' * 2
    def chunk\(ctype, data\):
        c = ctype + data
        return struct.pack\(''>I'', len\(data\)\) + c + struct.pack\(''>I'', zlib.crc32\(c\) & 0xffffffff\)
    return b''\\x89PNG\\r\\n\\x1a\\n'' + chunk\(b''IHDR'', struct.pack\(''>IIBBBBB'', 2, 2, 8, 2, 0, 0, 0\)\) + chunk\(b''IDAT'', zlib.compress\(raw\)\) + chunk\(b''IEND'', b''''\)
img = base64.b64encode\(create_tiny_png\(\)\).decode\(\)
print\(''Sending request to gemma3:4b...'', flush=True\)
start = time.time\(\)
resp = client.chat.completions.create\(
    model=''gemma3:4b'',
    messages=[{''role'':''user'',''content'':[{''type'':''text'',''text'':''What is this image? Reply briefly.''},{''type'':''image_url'',''image_url'':{''url'':f''data:image/png;base64,{img}''}}]}]
\)
elapsed = time.time\(\) - start
print\(f''Response in {elapsed:.1f}s: {resp.choices[0].message.content[:200]}''\)
")
